en_US.content_html:
Mozzarella di Bufala Campana PDO

The Undisputed Queen

The Mozzarella di Bufala Campana PDO is the most prestigious Italian fresh cheese in the world. Made with 100% buffalo milk, it offers intense flavor, unique elastic texture and an incomparable organoleptic experience.

PDO Characteristics

Production Area

Territory:

  • Campania (provinces: Caserta, Salerno)
  • Lazio (provinces: Latina, Frosinone, Rome)
  • Apulia (Foggia)
  • Molise (bordering areas)

Technical Profile

ParameterValue
Milk100% Mediterranean buffalo
Weight50g - 800g (multiple formats)
Moisture60-65%
FatMin 52% d.m.
Shelf life3-7 days
FlavorIntense, sweet, tangy

Buffalo vs. Cow's Milk

AspectBuffaloFior di Latte (Cow)
Milk100% buffalo100% cow
FlavorIntense, characteristicDelicate, neutral
Fat52% (richer)40-45%
Price/kg‚Ç¨18-28‚Ç¨10-15
UseRaw, tastingPizza, cooking
TextureElastic, fibrousCompact, soft

Use in Cuisine

Gourmet Caprese

  • Buffalo mozzarella 250g
  • Cherry tomatoes
  • Fresh basil
  • Quality extra virgin olive oil
  • Maldon salt

Gourmet Margherita Pizza

Topping:

  • San Marzano tomato
  • Buffalo mozzarella AFTER baking (not before!)
  • Fresh basil
  • Extra virgin olive oil
Note: Add buffalo mozzarella AFTER baking to avoid excessive water release.

LAPA Buffalo Mozzarella

  • ‚úÖ PDO Certified
  • ‚úÖ Freshness 24-48h from production
  • ‚úÖ Cold chain guaranteed
  • ‚úÖ Formats: 125g, 250g, 500g
  • ‚úÖ Delivery 24-48h Switzerland

Formats

  • 125g: Single portion
  • 250g: Classic (1-2 people)
  • 500g: Sharing
  • Bocconcini 50g: For salads

Wine Pairings

  • üç∑ Falanghina - Campanian, fresh
  • üç∑ Greco di Tufo - Structured
  • üç∑ Fiano di Avellino - Elegant
  • üç∑ Prosecco - Light bubbles

FAQ

What's the difference between buffalo mozzarella and burrata?

Mozzarella di Bufala:

  • Compact pasta filata
  • 100% buffalo milk
  • Uniform elastic texture
  • Intense flavor
Burrata:
  • Pasta filata shell + stracciatella filling
  • Cow's milk (typically)
  • Creamy inner texture
  • More delicate flavor

How to store buffalo mozzarella?

Temperature: 2-4¬∞C In liquid: Always submerged Consumption: 3-7 days from production Never freeze

Why does buffalo mozzarella cost more?

  • Milk yield: Buffaloes produce LESS milk (10L/day vs. 25L cows)
  • Milk quality: Richer, fattier, more protein
  • Breeding: More expensive, delicate animals
  • Processing: Artisanal, very fresh
  • PDO: Strict controls, traceability
Result: Premium quality = premium price

Conclusion

The Mozzarella di Bufala Campana PDO is the excellent fresh cheese for restaurants that focus on quality. Essential for caprese, refined appetizers, and gourmet pizzas.

LAPA guarantees: PDO certified, 24-48h freshness, fast delivery to Switzerland.
